titles.title: 361 As The Bridegroom to His Chosen (nice easy tun

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
As the bridegroom to his chosen
As the king unto his realm
As the keep unto the castle
As the pilot to the helm
So dear Lord
Art Thou to me
So dear Lord
Art Thou to me

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
As the fountain in the garden
As the candle in the dark
As the treasure in the coffer
As the manna in the ark
So, dear Lord
Art Thou to me
So dear Lord
Art Thou to me

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
As the music at the banquet
As the stamp unto the seal
As the medicine to the fainting
As the wine-cup at the meal
So dear Lord
Art Thou to me
So dear Lord
Art Thou to me

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
As the ruby in the setting
As the honey in the comb
As the light
Within the lantern
As the father in the home
So dear Lord
Art Thou to me
So dear Lord
Art Thou to me

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
As the sunshine to the heaven
As the image to the glass
As the fruit unto the fig-tree
As the dew unto the grass
So dear Lord
Art Thou to me
So dear Lord
Art Thou to me
